titles.title: Veterans Online Information and Cybersecurity Empowerment Act of 2022
Veterans Online Information and Cybersecurity Empowerment Act of 2022
VOICE Act of 2022
A bill to improve cybersecurity practices and improve digital literacy among veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Online Information and Cybersecurity Empowerment Act of 2022 or the VOICE Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to establish a program to promote digital citizenship and media literacy among veterans by awarding grants to eligible entities, which include civil society organizations and congressionally chartered veterans service organizations.
